q: Page replaces Google CEO Eric Schmidt , who will become executive chairman. In a blog post, Eric Schmidt said Page would merge Google's technology and business vision brilliantly. Barack Obama Chuck Schumer and Barack Obama Kirsten Gillibrand have all moved to a pro-same sex marriage stance in recent years. These numbers are a complete flip from where New Yorkers stood on the issue just six years ago. New York State voter attitudes about gay marriage have shifted dramatically since April 15, 2004, when Quinnipiac University first asked about gay marriage and found voters opposed the measure 55-37 percent, said Maurice Carroll, director of the Quinnipiac University Polling Institute.
